body_html: i think we should add gradgradcheck, just like gradcheck. We dont know if new-style functions have been written correctly for grad of grad out of the box (for example, user may have rewrapped a Variable somewhere and thought it was okay)

body: i think we should add gradgradcheck, just like gradcheck. We dont know if new-style functions have been written correctly for grad of grad out of the box (for example, user may have rewrapped a Variable somewhere and thought it was okay)
